text.title: English
text.welcome:
Hello %s and Welcome to Qlik Sense Bot.
Thanks for adding me into your contacts.
Type 'help' for all available commands.
text.actions: Select one of the actions below:

help.title: Help
help.text: Please select one of the available apps below, or change your language.

language.text: Select one the below available languages:
language.set: Your language has been set to **English**
